H0.text: They both take in water from the soil is how xylem is similar to phloem in a plant.

H1.text: They both transport materials through the plant, a function shared by xylem and phloem in a plant.

H2.text: In a plant, xylem and phloem both make sugar in the leaves.

H3.text: They both store waste products in the plant cells, making xylem similar to phloem in a plant.

A4.text: Xylem and phloem are both types of transport tissue in vascular plants
